name: GRABE 4X4 (Demo 1.0) Free Beat 'em up beatemup
description:
C O R E   G A M E   M E C H A N I C

This is the first Beat Em Up to implement the innovative 4x4 stylistic combat system as the game core mechanic. The 4x4 system uses 4 basic buttons and each button is capable to execute different combo attacks, jump attacks, dash attacks and grab attacks.

In this game YOUR ENEMY HAS MORE INTEL ABOUT YOU and that's the main reason why they can just detect most of your attacks and moves. Randomly they can detect 2 buttons from your 4 active attack buttons at a time. So that means they can block, dodge or even counter your attack if you hit them pressing the wrong button. 

On the other hand, the 4x4 system is offering the player a 27 different attack options and mechanics to deal with these problem but you need to detect which attack will work or not, only by directly engaging with your enemies.

IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO USE THE
STANDARD 8 BUTTON X-INPUT CONTROLLER
PAUSE THE GAME DURING GAME PLAY AND GO TO CONTROLS TO
VIEW ALL THE LIST OF 4X4 MECHANICS FOR THIS GAME.


"WATCH THE YOUTUBE VIDEO FOR THE DEMONSTRATION"
